sqlMap.sql: select u.ACCT_ENGI_NOTE_ID, u.YEAR, u.MONTH, u.UPD_NAME, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.STATE, a.CHANN_NO, a.CHANN_NAME from BASE_CHANN a,DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE u where a.CHANN_ID=u.LEDGER_ID
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE u
select INIT_YEAR,INIT_MONTH, COST_TYPE,CHANN_NAME from BASE_CHANN where CHANN_ID=#LEDGER_ID#

select sum(THE_NUM)THE_NUM,sum(PRE_NUM)PRE_NUM from ( select count(*) THE_NUM ,0 PRE_NUM from DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#YEAR# and MONTH=#MONTH# and STATE=#STATE# union all select 0 THE_NUM, count(*) PRE_NUM from DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#PRE_YEAR# and MONTH=#PRE_MONTH# and STATE=#STATE# )temp
select count(*) IS_NOTICE_FLAG from DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#YEAR# and MONTH=#MONTH#
select count(*) IS_ACCT_FLAG from DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#NEX_YEAR# and MONTH=#NEX_MONTH# and STATE='已月结'
sqlMap.update: update DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE set STATE = '已生成', UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME#, UPD_TIME = sysdate where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#YEAR# and MONTH=#MONTH#
update DRP_ACCT_ENGI_NOTE set STATE = '取消生成', UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME#, UPD_TIME = sysdate where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR=#YEAR# and MONTH=#MONTH# and STATE='已生成'
sqlMap.delete: delete from DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL_A where SALE_ORDER_ID in( select SALE_ORDER_ID from DRP_SALE_ORDER_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)
delete from DRP_SALE_ORDER_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#
delete from DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_A where STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_STOREOUT_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)
delete from DRP_STOREOUT_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#
delete from DRP_RETURN_DTL_A where PRD_RETURN_ID in( select PRD_RETURN_ID from DRP_RETURN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)
delete from DRP_RETURN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#
delete from DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A where STOREIN_ID in( select STOREIN_ID from DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)
delete from DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#

delete from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A where STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# ))
delete from DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# )

delete from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_DTL_A where STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# ))
delete from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# )

delete from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A where STOREIN_ID in( select STOREIN_ID from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# ) )
delete from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# )
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_SALE_ORDER_A(SALE_ORDER_ID,SALE_ORDER_NO,BILL_TYPE,FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, ORDER_CHANN_ID , ORDER_CHANN_NO, ORDER_CHANN_NAME, ORDER_DATE,PERSON_CON,TEL,RECV_ADDR,STATE,REMARK, CREATOR ,CRE_NAME,CRE_TIME, UPDATOR ,UPD_NAME,UPD_TIME, AUDIT_ID,AUDIT_NAME,AUDIT_TIME,DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID ,ORG_NAME ,LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG,AREA_ID, AREA_NO,AREA_NAME, RECV_ADDR_NO,YEAR_MONTH,RSP_NAME) select a.STOREOUT_ID SALE_ORDER_ID, replace(a.STOREOUT_NO,'CK','SO')SALE_ORDER_NO, '正常销售' BILL_TYPE, a.STOREOUT_ID FROM_BILL_ID, a.STOREOUT_NO FROM_BILL_NO, a.TERM_ID ORDER_CHANN_ID, a.TERM_NO ORDER_CHANN_NO, a.TERM_NAME ORDER_CHANN_NAME, a.SALE_DATE ORDER_DATE, '' PERSON_CON, '' TEL, c.ADDRESS RECV_ADDR, '审核通过'STATE, '' REMARK, a.CREATOR, a.CRE_NAME, a.SALE_DATE+(1/24)*( mod(rownum,10)) +(1/24/60)*(30+ mod(rownum,200))+(1/24/60/60)*(mod(rownum,20)) CRE_TIME, a.UPDATOR, a.UPD_NAME, a.DEAL_TIME UPD_TIME, #CREATOR# AUDIT_ID, #CRE_NAME# AUDIT_NAME, a.DEAL_TIME AUDIT_TIME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_NAME, a.LEDGER_ID, a.LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, c.AREA_ID, c.AREA_NO, c.AREA_NAME, '' RECV_ADDR_NO, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, c.CUST_NAME RSP_NAME from DRP_STOREOUT a left join BASE_TERMINAL c on a.TERM_ID=c.TERM_ID where a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH#

insert into DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL_A(SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID,SALE_ORDER_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO,PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC,BRAND,STD_UNIT,IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, PRICE,DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE,ORDER_NUM,ORDER_AMOUNT,SENDED_NUM,CANCLE_NUM,REMARK, DEL_FLAG,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,CANCEL_FLAG,SPCL_TECH_ID,YEAR_MONTH,PRD_TYPE) select b.STOREOUT_DTL_ID SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.STOREOUT_ID SALE_ORDER_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, 0 IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) PRICE, 1, NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) DECT_PRICE, b.REAL_NUM ORDER_NUM, b.REAL_NUM*NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) ORDER_AMOUNT, b.REAL_NUM SENDED_NUM, 0 CANCLE_NUM, '' REMARK, 0 DEL_FLAG, b.STOREOUT_DTL_ID FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, 0 CANCEL_FLAG, b.SPCL_TECH_ID SPCL_TECH_ID, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, b.PRD_TYPE from DRP_STOREOUT a ,DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_V b ,BASE_PRODUCT c , BASE_CHANN d where a.STOREOUT_ID=b.STOREOUT_ID and b.PRD_ID=c.PRD_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=d.CHANN_ID and a.DEAL_FLAG=1 and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_STOREOUT_A (STOREOUT_ID,STOREOUT_NO,FROM_BILL_ID,FROM_BILL_NO,STOREOUT_STORE_ID,STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME,RECV_CHANN_ID,RECV_CHANN_NO,RECV_CHANN_NAME,SALE_DATE,RECV_ADDR, STOREOUT_AMOUNT,STATE,DEAL_TIME,REMARK,CREATOR,CRE_NAME,CRE_TIME,UPDATOR,UPD_NAME,UPD_TIME,DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,LEDGER_ID,LEDGER_NAME,DEL_FLAG,YEAR_MONTH,RSP_NAME) select a.STOREOUT_ID, a.STOREOUT_NO, a.STOREOUT_ID, replace(a.STOREOUT_NO,'CK','SO') FROM_BILL_NO, a.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, a.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, a.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, a.TERM_ID RECV_CHANN_ID, a.TERM_NO RECV_CHANN_NO, a.TERM_NAME RECV_CHANN_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, c.ADDRESS RECV_ADDR, a.STOREOUT_AMOUNT, a.STATE, a.DEAL_TIME, '' REMARK, a.DEAL_PSON_ID, a.DEAL_PSON_NAME, a.DEAL_TIME-(1/24/60)*(30+ mod(rownum,200)) -(1/24/60/60)*(mod(rownum,20)) CRE_TIME, a.DEAL_PSON_ID, a.DEAL_PSON_NAME, a.DEAL_TIME UPD_TIME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_NAME, a.LEDGER_ID, a.LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, c.CUST_NAME RSP_NAME from DRP_STOREOUT a left join BASE_TERMINAL c on a.TERM_ID=c.TERM_ID where a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH#

insert into DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_A (STOREOUT_DTL_ID,STOREOUT_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO,PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR,BRAND,STD_UNIT,NOTICE_NUM,PRICE,DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE, DECT_AMOUNT,REMARK,DEL_FLAG,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,SPCL_TECH_ID, REAL_NUM,YEAR_MONTH,PRD_TYPE) select b.STOREOUT_DTL_ID, a.STOREOUT_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.PRD_COLOR, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, b.REAL_NUM NOTICE_NUM, NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) PRICE, 1 DECT_RATE, NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) DECT_PRICE, b.REAL_NUM*NVL(c.PRVD_PRICE*NVL(d.CHANN_SALE_RATE,1.1),0) DECT_AMOUNT, '' REMARK, 0 DEL_FLAG, b.STOREOUT_DTL_ID FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, b.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.REAL_NUM , #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, b.PRD_TYPE from DRP_STOREOUT a ,DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_V b ,BASE_PRODUCT c , BASE_CHANN d where a.STOREOUT_ID=b.STOREOUT_ID and b.PRD_ID=c.PRD_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=d.CHANN_ID and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH#
sqlMap.update: update DRP_STOREOUT_A a set a.STOREOUT_AMOUNT=(select sum(DECT_AMOUNT) from DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_A b where a.STOREOUT_ID=b.STOREOUT_ID) where a.STATE='已处理' and a.YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_RETURN_A(PRD_RETURN_ID,PRD_RETURN_NO,BILL_TYPE,FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO,RETURN_CHANN_ID,RETURN_CHANN_NO,RETURN_CHANN_NAME, EXPECT_RETURNDATE,STATE,REMARK,CREATOR,CRE_NAME,CRE_TIME,UPDATOR, UPD_NAME,UPD_TIME,AUDIT_ID,AUDIT_NAME,AUDIT_TIME,DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,LEDGER_ID,LEDGER_NAME,DEL_FLAG, RETURN_RSON,YEAR_MONTH,RSP_NAME) select a.STOREIN_ID PRD_RETURN_ID, replace(a.STOREIN_NO,'RK','RT')PRD_RETURN_NO, '正常退货' BILL_TYPE, a.STOREIN_ID FROM_BILL_ID, a.STOREIN_NO FROM_BILL_NO, b.TERM_ID RETURN_CHANN_ID, b.TERM_NO RETURN_CHANN_NO, b.TERM_NAME RETURN_CHANN_NAME, b.SALE_DATE EXPECT_RETURNDATE, a.STATE, '' REMARK, a.CREATOR, a.CRE_NAME, a.CRE_TIME, a.UPDATOR, a.UPD_NAME, a.UPD_TIME, a.DEAL_PSON_ID AUDIT_ID, a.DEAL_PSON_NAME AUDIT_NAME, (a.CRE_TIME+(1/24/60)*(30+ mod(rownum,200)) ) AUDIT_TIME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_NAME, a.LEDGER_ID, a.LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, '' RETURN_RSON, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, c.CUST_NAME from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b left join BASE_TERMINAL c on b.TERM_ID=c.TERM_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_RETURN_DTL_A (PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID,PRD_RETURN_ID,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO, PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC,PRD_COLOR,BRAND,STD_UNIT,RETURN_PRICE,RETURN_NUM, RETURN_AMOUNT,RETURN_RSON,DEL_FLAG,PRD_TYPE,SPCL_TECH_ID,YEAR_MONTH) select c.STOREIN_DTL_ID PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, c.STOREIN_ID PRD_RETURN_ID, c.STOREIN_DTL_ID FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, c.PRD_ID, c.PRD_NO, c.PRD_NAME, c.PRD_SPEC, c.PRD_COLOR, c.BRAND, c.STD_UNIT, c.DECT_PRICE RETURN_PRICE, c.REAL_NUM RETURN_NUM, c.DECT_AMOUNT RETURN_AMOUNT, '' RETURN_RSON, 0 DEL_FLAG, '' PRD_TYPE, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b,DRP_STOREIN_DTL c where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.STOREIN_ID=c.STOREIN_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_A ( STOREIN_ID,STOREIN_NO,BILL_TYPE,FROM_BILL_ID,FROM_BILL_NO, ORDER_CHANN_ID,ORDER_CHANN_NO,ORDER_CHANN_NAME, STOREIN_STORE_ID,STOREIN_STORE_NO, STOREIN_STORE_NAME,STATE,REMARK,CREATOR,CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, UPDATOR, UPD_NAME, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_PSON_ID, DEAL_PSON_NAME, STATEMENUT_DATE , YEAR_MONTH, RSP_NAME ) select a.STOREIN_ID, a.STOREIN_NO, '退货入库' BILL_TYPE, a.STOREIN_ID FROM_BILL_ID, replace(a.STOREIN_NO,'RK','RT') FROM_BILL_NO, b.TERM_ID RETURN_CHANN_ID, b.TERM_NO RETURN_CHANN_NO, b.TERM_NAME RETURN_CHANN_NAME, a.STOREIN_STORE_ID, a.STOREIN_STORE_NO, a.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, a.STATE, '' REMARK, a.CREATOR, a.CRE_NAME, a.CRE_TIME, a.UPDATOR, a.UPD_NAME, a.UPD_TIME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, a.ORG_ID, a.ORG_NAME, a.LEDGER_ID, a.LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, 1 DEAL_FLAG, a.DEAL_TIME, a.DEAL_PSON_ID, a.DEAL_PSON_NAME, a.STATEMENUT_DATE, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, c.CUST_NAME RSP_NAME from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b left join BASE_TERMINAL c on b.TERM_ID=c.TERM_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A ( STOREIN_DTL_ID,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,STOREIN_ID, PRD_ID,PRD_NO,PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC,BRAND, STD_UNIT,NOTICE_NUM,REAL_NUM,REMARK, PRICE,DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE,DECT_AMOUNT, DEL_FLAG,SPCL_TECH_ID,TAX_RATE,NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT,TAX_AMOUNT,YEAR_MONTH,PRD_TYPE ) select c.STOREIN_DTL_ID, c.STOREIN_DTL_ID FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, c.STOREIN_ID, c.PRD_ID, c.PRD_NO, c.PRD_NAME, c.PRD_SPEC, c.BRAND, c.STD_UNIT, c.NOTICE_NUM, c.REAL_NUM, c.REMARK, c.PRICE, c.DECT_RATE, c.DECT_PRICE, c.DECT_AMOUNT, 0 DEL_FLAG, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, c.TAX_RATE, c.NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, c.NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT, c.TAX_AMOUNT, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, d.PRD_TYPE from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b,DRP_STOREIN_DTL c left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL d on c.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID=d.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.STOREIN_ID=c.STOREIN_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_A ( STOREOUT_ID, STOREOUT_NO, BILL_TYPE, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, TERM_ID, TERM_NO, TERM_NAME, SALE_DATE, SALE_PSON_ID, SALE_PSON_NAME, CUST_NAME, TEL, RECV_ADDR, ORDER_RECV_DATE, STOREOUT_AMOUNT, ADVC_AMOUNT, PAYABLE_AMOUNT, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, UPDATOR, UPD_NAME, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, DEAL_FLAG, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_PSON_ID, DEAL_PSON_NAME, YEAR_MONTH ) select a.STOREOUT_ID, a.STOREOUT_NO, '销售出库' BILL_TYPE, a.FROM_BILL_ID, a.FROM_BILL_NO, a.TERM_ID STOREOUT_STORE_ID, a.TERM_NO||'-00' STOREOUT_STORE_NO, e.CUST_NAME||'库房' STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, a.SALE_PSON_ID, a.SALE_PSON_NAME, a.CUST_NAME, a.TEL, a.RECV_ADDR, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, a.STOREOUT_AMOUNT, a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.STATE, a.REMARK, c.CREATOR, c.CRE_NAME, c.CRE_TIME, c.UPDATOR, c.UPD_NAME, c.UPD_TIME, a.TERM_ID DEPT_ID, e.CUST_NAME DEPT_NAME, a.TERM_ID ORG_ID, e.CUST_NAME ORG_NAME, a.TERM_ID LEDGER_ID, e.CUST_NAME LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, 1 DEAL_FLAG, a.DEAL_TIME, c.CREATOR DEAL_PSON_ID, c.CRE_NAME DEAL_PSON_NAME, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREOUT a left join DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ c on a.FROM_BILL_ID=c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER d on c.FROM_BILL_ID=d.ADVC_ORDER_ID left join BASE_TERMINAL e on a.TERM_ID=e.TERM_ID where a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH#

insert into DRP_TERM_STOREOUT_DTL_A (STOREOUT_DTL_ID,STOREOUT_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO,PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC,BRAND,STD_UNIT,NOTICE_NUM,REAL_NUM,PRICE, DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE,DECT_AMOUNT,REMARK,DEL_FLAG, FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,SPCL_TECH_ID,PRD_TYPE,YEAR_MONTH) select c.STOREOUT_DTL_ID, c.STOREOUT_ID, c.PRD_ID, c.PRD_NO, c.PRD_NAME, c.PRD_SPEC, c.BRAND, c.STD_UNIT, c.NOTICE_NUM, c.REAL_NUM, c.PRICE, c.DECT_RATE, c.DECT_PRICE, c.DECT_AMOUNT, c.REMARK, 0 DEL_FLAG, c.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, c. PRD_TYPE, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREOUT a ,DRP_STOREOUT_DTL c where a.STOREOUT_ID=c.STOREOUT_ID and a.DEAL_FLAG=1 and a.BILL_TYPE='销售出库' and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and c.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_A( STOREOUT_ID,STOREOUT_NO,FROM_BILL_ID,FROM_BILL_NO,STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO,STOREOUT_STORE_NAME,SALE_DATE,RECV_ADDR, RECV_CHANN_ID,RECV_CHANN_NO,RECV_CHANN_NAME,STOREOUT_AMOUNT,STATE, REMARK,CREATOR,CRE_NAME,CRE_TIME,UPDATOR,UPD_NAME,UPD_TIME,DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,LEDGER_ID,LEDGER_NAME,DEL_FLAG,YEAR_MONTH ) select a.STOREIN_ID STOREOUT_ID, replace(a.STOREIN_NO,'RK','CK') STOREOUT_NO, a.FROM_BILL_ID FROM_BILL_ID, a.FROM_BILL_NO FROM_BILL_NO, b.TERM_ID STOREOUT_STORE_ID, b.TERM_NO||'-00' STOREOUT_STORE_NO, e.CUST_NAME||'库房' STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, b.SALE_DATE, '' RECV_ADDR, d.CHANN_ID RECV_CHANN_ID, d.CHANN_NO RECV_CHANN_NO, d.CHANN_NAME RECV_CHANN_NAME, 0 STOREOUT_AMOUNT, '已处理' STATE, '' REMARK, b. CREATOR, b.CRE_NAME, b.CRE_TIME, b.UPDATOR, b.UPD_NAME, b.UPD_TIME, b.TERM_ID DEPT_ID, e.CUST_NAME DEPT_NAME, b.TERM_ID ORG_ID, e.CUST_NAME ORG_NAME, b.TERM_ID LEDGER_ID, e.CUST_NAME LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREIN a left join BASE_CHANN d on a.LEDGER_ID=d.CHANN_ID ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b left join BASE_TERMINAL e on b.TERM_ID=e.TERM_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_DTL_A ( STOREOUT_DTL_ID,STOREOUT_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO,PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC,PRD_COLOR, BRAND,STD_UNIT,NOTICE_NUM,PRICE,DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE,DECT_AMOUNT, REMARK,DEL_FLAG,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,SPCL_TECH_ID,REAL_NUM,PRD_TYPE,YEAR_MONTH ) select b.STOREIN_DTL_ID STOREOUT_DTL_ID, b.STOREIN_ID STOREOUT_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.PRD_COLOR, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, b.NOTICE_NUM, b.PRICE, b.DECT_RATE, b.DECT_PRICE, b.DECT_AMOUNT, '' REMARK, 0 DEL_FLAG, b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, b.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.REAL_NUM, c.PRD_TYPE, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_STOREIN_DTL b left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL c on b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID=c.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.STOREIN_ID=b.STOREIN_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_A ( STOREIN_ID,STOREIN_NO,BILL_TYPE,FROM_BILL_ID ,FROM_BILL_NO, TERM_ID,TERM_NO,TERM_NAME,SALE_DATE,SALE_PSON_ID,SALE_PSON_NAME, CUST_NAME,TEL,STOREIN_STORE_ID,STOREIN_STORE_NO,STOREIN_STORE_NAME, STATE,REMARK,CREATOR,CRE_NAME,CRE_TIME,UPDATOR,UPD_NAME,UPD_TIME , DEPT_ID,DEPT_NAME,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,LEDGER_ID,LEDGER_NAME,DEL_FLAG, DEAL_FLAG,DEAL_TIME,DEAL_PSON_ID,DEAL_PSON_NAME,STATEMENUT_DATE,YEAR_MONTH ) select a.STOREIN_ID, a.STOREIN_NO, '退货入库'BILL_TYPE, a.FROM_BILL_ID, a.FROM_BILL_NO, b.TERM_ID, b.TERM_NO, e.CUST_NAME TERM_NAME, b.SALE_DATE, b.SALE_PSON_ID, b.SALE_PSON_NAME, b.CUST_NAME, b.TEL, b.TERM_ID STOREIN_STORE_ID, b.TERM_NO||'-00' STOREIN_STORE_NO, e.CUST_NAME||'库房' STOREIN_STORE_NAME, '已处理'STATE, '' REMARK, b.CREATOR, b.CRE_NAME, b.CRE_TIME, b.UPDATOR, b.UPD_NAME, b.UPD_TIME, b.TERM_ID DEPT_ID, e.CUST_NAME DEPT_NAME, b.TERM_ID ORG_ID, e.CUST_NAME ORG_NAME, b.TERM_ID LEDGER_ID, e.CUST_NAME LEDGER_NAME, 0 DEL_FLAG, 1 DEAL_FLAG, a.DEAL_TIME, a.DEAL_PSON_ID, a.DEAL_PSON_NAME, a.STATEMENUT_DATE, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH from DRP_STOREIN a left join BASE_CHANN d on a.LEDGER_ID=d.CHANN_ID ,DRP_ADVC_ORDER b left join BASE_TERMINAL e on b.TERM_ID=e.TERM_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.FROM_BILL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0

insert into DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A (STOREIN_DTL_ID,STOREIN_ID,FROM_BILL_DTL_ID,PRD_ID,PRD_NO, PRD_NAME,PRD_SPEC,BRAND,STD_UNIT,NOTICE_NUM,REAL_NUM, REMARK,PRICE,DECT_RATE,DECT_PRICE,DECT_AMOUNT,DEL_FLAG,SPCL_TECH_ID, TAX_RATE,NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE,NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT,TAX_AMOUNT,YEAR_MONTH, PRD_TYPE) select b.STOREIN_DTL_ID, b.STOREIN_ID, b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, b.NOTICE_NUM, b.REAL_NUM, ''REMARK, b.PRICE, b.DECT_RATE, b.DECT_PRICE, b.DECT_AMOUNT, 0 DEL_FLAG, b.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.TAX_RATE, b.NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE, b.NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT, b.TAX_AMOUNT, #YEAR_MONTH# YEAR_MONTH, c.PRD_TYPE
from DRP_STOREIN a ,DRP_STOREIN_DTL b left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL c on b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID=c.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID where a.BILL_TYPE='终端退货' and a.STOREIN_ID=b.STOREIN_ID and a.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'YYYYMM')=#YEAR_MONTH# and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0
sqlMap.update: update DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL_A u set PRICE= NVL((select $PRICE_EXPRESS$ from DRP_STOREOUT_DTL b ,BASE_PRODUCT c where b.PRD_ID=c.PRD_ID and b.STOREOUT_DTL_ID=u.From_Bill_Dtl_Id ),0) where u.SALE_ORDER_ID in ( select SALE_ORDER_ID from DRP_SALE_ORDER_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and ORDER_CHANN_ID=#TERM_ID#)

update DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_A u set PRICE= NVL((select PRICE from DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL_A b where b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID=u.From_Bill_Dtl_Id ),0) where u.STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_STOREOUT_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and RECV_CHANN_ID=#TERM_ID#)

update DRP_RETURN_DTL_A u set RETURN_PRICE= NVL((select $PRICE_EXPRESS$ from DRP_STOREIN_DTL b ,BASE_PRODUCT c where b.PRD_ID=c.PRD_ID and b.STOREIN_DTL_ID=u.From_Bill_Dtl_Id ),0) where u.PRD_RETURN_ID in( select PRD_RETURN_ID from DRP_RETURN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and RETURN_CHANN_ID=#TERM_ID#)

update DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A u set PRICE= NVL((select PRICE from DRP_RETURN_DTL_A b where b.PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID=u.From_Bill_Dtl_Id ),0) where u.STOREIN_ID in( select STOREIN_ID from DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and ORDER_CHANN_ID=#TERM_ID#)

update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_DTL_A u set PRICE= NVL((select PRICE from DRP_RETURN_DTL_A b where b.PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID=u.From_Bill_Dtl_Id ),0) where u.STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID=#TERM_ID# )

update DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL_A u set DECT_PRICE=PRICE, ORDER_AMOUNT= PRICE*ORDER_NUM where u.SALE_ORDER_ID in ( select SALE_ORDER_ID from DRP_SALE_ORDER_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)
update DRP_STOREOUT_DTL_A u set DECT_PRICE= PRICE, DECT_AMOUNT =PRICE*REAL_NUM where u.STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_STOREOUT_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# )
update DRP_RETURN_DTL_A u set RETURN_AMOUNT =RETURN_PRICE*RETURN_NUM where u.PRD_RETURN_ID in( select PRD_RETURN_ID from DRP_RETURN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)

update DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_DTL_A u set DECT_PRICE=PRICE, DECT_AMOUNT=DECT_PRICE*REAL_NUM, NO_TAX_DECT_PRICE= round(DECT_PRICE/1.17,2), NO_TAX_DECT_AMOUNT=round(DECT_PRICE/1.17,2)*REAL_NUM, TAX_AMOUNT=DECT_PRICE*REAL_NUM-round(DECT_PRICE/1.17,2)*REAL_NUM where u.STOREIN_ID in( select STOREIN_ID from DRP_RETURN_STOREIN_A where LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH#)

update DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_DTL_A u set DECT_PRICE=PRICE,DECT_AMOUNT= PRICE*REAL_NUM where u.STOREOUT_ID in( select STOREOUT_ID from DRP_TREM_RETURN_STOREOUT_A where YEAR_MONTH=#YEAR_MONTH# and LEDGER_ID in (select TERM_ID from BASE_TERMINAL a where a.CHANN_ID_P=#LEDGER_ID# ))
